name: Copied  Custom
description: I stole everything in this style. I used things I liked from The Spooky Scary Style, Dragon Type Style, Zoarark Style, And Water Type Style. If you find anything wrong with this style, don't come to me. I know nothing on how to crate a style. Sorry If you made one of these styles, and it took you a long time, but I just took 20 mins and made my personal fav style.
